description:
Short board, Long board who cares? It is ALL ABOUT SURFING! Instead of polarizing yourself to one group why not learn both styles to REAP THE BENEFITS!


My name is Dalton Brewster and I am a licensed surf instructor in fabulous San Diego, ca. I have been surfing for 10 years and I plan on using my experience and passion to help others make the transition from Long to Short board surfing. For the first 3 years of my surfing career, I rode a 9'0'' Longboard but I wanted to gain the benefits that short boarding can provide including, duck diving, access to a greater variety of spots, ability to do more tricks such as snap turns, and lastly the satisfaction of being able to complete one of the toughest transitions in the sport.


What's Included:

crucial step by step methods to achieve this goal including:

-paddling

-duck diving

- take off

-turning, maneuverability and more

-Last but not least, a surf consultant that you can contact through a variety of mediums

-43 minutesÂ of content and a 30 money back guarantee

-available on IOS and android

-certificate of completion language English



Who is the target audience?

an advanced beginner or intermediate surfer looking to take their surfing to the next level. By learning both styles of surfing, it opens up new opportunities to try new tricks on both crafts, surf more days a year, explore different breaks as well as the ability to relate with all surfers!
title: Transitioning to shortboard surfing
